PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-13982000-09-060,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of RICHARD ANTHONY BEATON, Vice-President of Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation, of Sydney River, Nova Scotia, to be concurrently Chief Executive Officer of the Cape Breton Growth Fund Corporation, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis, for a term of three years, or until the dissolution of the Cape Breton Growth Fund Corporation, whichever occurs first.
Attachments
